name: DePePe Fruit Salad
steps: Boil the de pepe noodles n 2 c. water. Drain juice from fruit and add 1 beaten egg, 2/3 c. sugar, 1 tsp lemon extract, 1 tsp salt, 2 Tbsp cornstarch to juice. Cook until thick. Cool. Mix fruit, noodles and juice. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Add 1 c. mini marshmallows and 1 large tub Cool Whip. Smooth out and let set up.
